availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jesse H. Reno (Muhlenberg Circuit Court clerk and quartermaster, 11th KY Infantry)

body.p: Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, circuit clerk. Kentucky native. Clerk of the Muhlenberg Circuit Court in Muhlenberg County. During Civil War, quartermaster of Company F and Company S of the 11th Kentucky Infantry, a Union regiment.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Muhlenberg County, District 1, p. 40.
National Park Service. U.S. Civil War Soldiers, 1861-1865 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2007, Jesse H. Reno, Fim # M386 roll 22.
